scripts.clean:reports: mkdir -p cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/reports/* && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.after-test: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.chrome:test: npm run clean:reports && npm run headed || npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.cy:ci: npm run clean:reports && npm run headless || npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
